channel.title: Trying to make my MenuItem link to website... SOLVED!

item.title: Trying to make my MenuItem link to website... SOLVED!
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

Basically you probably got what I’m trying to do from the title. ^^

Well, I’ll post what I got so far from researching this. I got it to compile fine but it doesn’t actually open the website.

	Menu linksMenu = new Menu("Links");
	mBar.add(linksMenu);
	MenuItem webMItem = new MenuItem("Website");
	linksMenu.add(webMItem);
                 webMItem.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
                     public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent ae) {
                         try {
                             URL url = new URL("http://royalscape.clan.su");
                             URLConnection conn = url.openConnection();
                             conn.connect();
                         } catch (MalformedURLException e) {
                         } catch (java.io.IOException e) {   
                         }
                     }
                 });

Basically, it makes the menuitem show up, but the action doesn’t work. Can someone maybe give me a few pointers on what I need to do? Thanks!

EDIT: SOVED!

Read full topic
item.source: Trying to make my MenuItem link to website... SOLVED!
